scripts.preview:dev: export AWS_PROFILE=heemang.aws; pulumi stack select nai/dev; pulumi preview
scripts.preview:prod: export AWS_PROFILE=heemang.aws; pulumi stack select nai/prod; pulumi preview
scripts.deploy:dev: export AWS_PROFILE=heemang.aws; pulumi stack select nai/dev; pulumi up
scripts.deploy:prod: export AWS_PROFILE=heemang.aws; pulumi stack select nai/prod; pulumi up
